name: Space World
description:
Plot:

"All humans escaped from Earth with rockets and capsules because it started eating every present human. Because of this, Earth begins to deteriorate and shrink. The only way Earth has to save itself is to look for humans in space…"

Info:

Initially, the game had to have different levels, in which you have to "take" an established number of people. Unfortunately I did not have enough time to create more levels and enemies(or sound), so I make just one "endless" level.

However, the goal is to destroy the white capsules, and "take" the human inside. You have 3 lives, which decrease each time you hit a meteorite, or a capsule.

Controls:

WASD - Move the Earth;

Left Click - Shoot;
